text:
The two therapists - Jason Teo n Samuel Lek, are excellent, caring, patient n encouraging. I have improved tremendously due to their expertise n careful training. Despite their tight schedule, having to deal with so many patients, they are so patient, thoughtful n kind. Bravo to them.

Many of the nurses - male n female are friendly, patient n kind. They are very gentle when handling patients. Always cheerful n encouraging. They have made my stay very pleasant. Well done nurses.

Mdm Molly Teo
Patient from 23/4/2025 to 3/5/25
Rehab therapists are good, nurses are mostly caring
Bad experience at this hospital don't stay
